Description:
A real treat for fans of horror games. Group of fans under the name Team Psykskallar, has created one of the most ambitious horror games over the last few years. Excellent graphics, please note that this is a converted engine Half-Life, to the atmosphere of terror, well-chosen music, non-linear storyline with multiple endings, the presence of the puzzles in the tradition of the first parts of Silent Hill, the NSA games, as well as the real horror that you will accompany you throughout the entire game.
